topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Deploy the Debug Off Patch

section.p: Use this patch if you are not using the Centralized Logging (ELK) feature to turn debugging off.

p.note: If you are using Centralized Logging, do not apply this patch.

section.p: This patch changes the logging of the services from INFO or DEBUG to WARNING.
If the /etc/glance/api-logging.conf and /etc/glance/registry-logging.conf files both have the log level set to INFO, this patch was applied during installation. You can disregard these steps.

body.section:
Download the patch
If you have not downloaded the patch, launch the Helion Distribution Network (HDN). You must obtain a user account on HDN in order to download these files. In a browser, navigate to Helion Download Network(HDN).
Click Sign In to log in using your account.
After signing in, click the Downloads link in the menu on the left side of the page.
Download the patch and the associated checksum and signature files.
Verify the downloaded signature and the downloaded checksums.
Extract the compressed files until the knc-debug-off.patch and readme files are available.
The README with the patch download contains information on files changed by these patches.

ol.li:
Log onto the lifecycle manager VM.ssh <lifecycle manager_VM_IP>
where: lifecycle manager_VM_IP is the CLM IP of the lifecycle manager. Locate the IP address for the lifecycle manager in the /root/infra-ansible-playbooks/group_vars/all file under hlm_clmstaticip field.
Copy the file to the ~/ directory.
Execute the following command to deploy the patch: patch -p1 < ../knc-debug-off.patch
Execute the following command to integrate the changes into the environment:./hlm_prepare-env.sh
Execute the following command:hlm generate -c <cloud name>

Execute the following command on all tiers:
For Sacramento deployments:hlm deploy -c <cloud name> -t "ATTIS ELK-SCH GLA-API IC2-WEB SWF-CMN FND-CLU NEU-API DCN-NEU ML2-SRIOV NEU-API-BAR IRN-CMN IRN-CMD CPX-CFG"
For Memphis, Tahoe and Denver deployments to remove the Attis role that doesn't exist on that topology:hlm deploy -c <cloud name> -t "ATTIS ELK-SCH GLA-API IC2-WEB SWF-CMN FND-CLU NEU-API DCN-NEU ML2-SRIOV CPX-CFG"
